reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress feminine and flattering, particularly appreciating the v-neckline and how it accentuates smaller waist and body shape. The dress is comfortable, especially for hot days, and comes in various colors, with one customer noting it's great for wearing black underwear. While some customers praise the fabric quality, others find it feels cheap, and opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it great while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black summer dress
items.body: What a perfect dress! I needed a fast black dress for a summer funeral and I chose this due to the fast delivery to the US while flying there from Australia. I was a tad reluctant because I‚Äôm not a ruffle dress kinda gal but it‚Äôs very subtle in black and a very flattering dress on my size1X 63-yo body. The XXL fits me well with some room to spare and the slip underneath is much longer than what the photo would have you believe, which I‚Äôm thankful for the length as my legs swell ridiculously when I fly and this dress will cover that for me. I will wear this for other occasions as well, dinners out, etc. Just a very pretty dress that you‚Äôll appreciate! Seams are sturdy, the fabric is nice, the belt is a good length. It‚Äôs a bit of an empire waist as opposed to my true waist but it looks fantastic regardless. It comes with an extra snap set if you need it. The existing snap at the cleavage is just right for me but you could sew on the other if you want more coverage if you‚Äôre very busty. Read more
items.author: kellabella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: I bought this for a wedding and it was perfect. It was comfortable and cool but fully lined as not to be see through. No slip needed. I appreciate the snap at the chest for modesty. The color is exactly as pictured. I used the tie that came with the dress but a more decorative belt would look nice too. I ordered the large but probably could have worn a medium in this. It's a looser fitting dress so it very forgiving. Dress is well made. No crooked seams or loose threads. Read more
items.author: Mama H

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Very nice dress, fits well. Was able to steam it to get wrinkles out pretty quickly. Looks very nice. Material is lightweight, has an interior slip so it‚Äôs not see through. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: LesahS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love
items.body: I love this dress! It was beautiful, flattering, and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Michelle anthony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made
items.body: This dress is even more beautiful than I expected. I don‚Äôt usually have high hopes for clothing that I order online. I needed a dress for family portraits coming up, and I took a chance on this one. I usually wear a size XL, but I ordered the Amazon recommended size L. It fits me perfect. I like that there is a small hidden snap on the front to keep it closed over my chest. The outer layer of material is very light and see through but there are additional layers underneath so seeing through it isn‚Äôt an issue. The pattern is just as pictured. The dress seems to be made with some decent quality, and it doesn‚Äôt look or feel cheap whatsoever. I just wish it had pockets, but it‚Äôs still an awesome dress! I am going to purchase another in a different color, and I‚Äôd definitely recommend this to anyone. Read more
items.author: Becca G

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing tie
items.body: The dress was true to size and looks fine but it arrived without the tie. I thought that accent was what made the dress cute and I‚Äôm disappointed it was not sent with the dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
items.body: This is a very pretty and feminine dress. The fabric is light and drapes well over the body. Pattern is printed very well. It does run long. Mine goes all the way to my ankles. I ordered the black and white print. Not cheap looking. Read more
items.author: seniorshopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Embrace Elegance with this Bohemian Floral Wrap dress
items.body: The BTFBM Women‚Äôs Summer Bohemian Floral Dress is a perfect blend of style, comfort, and elegance. This lightweight, soft polyester dress provides a cool and breathable experience, making it ideal for hot summer days. With its flattering design and versatile style, this dress is suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to formal events. Key Features: 1. Lightweight & Soft Material: - Made from high-quality polyester, this dress is lightweight and breathable, ensuring comfort in the summer heat. The soft lining prevents any see-through issues, allowing you to wear it confidently. 2. Feature Design: - This dress features a feminine deep V-neckline with a safety button, cute ruffle cap sleeves, an elastic band at the waist, and an extra belt of the same color and pattern. The A-line silhouette, flowy swing pleated hem, and romantic bohemian style add to its charm. 3. Flattering Ruffle Sleeveless: - The classic V-neck sleeveless design is enhanced with ruffle details around the sleeves, adding a touch of sophistication. The ruffle fabric is comfortable around the arms and helps to create a perfect arm line. 4. Hugs Your Figure Perfectly: - The high waist A-line silhouette, deep V-neck, and midi length offer a relaxed fit while highlighting your neckline, waist, and legs. This design provides an elegant and feminine look, hugging your curves beautifully. 5. Fit for Any Occasion: - This versatile dress can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. Pair it with sneakers or flats for a casual look, or strappy sandals and delicate jewelry for formal events. Suitable for everyday wear, vacations, beach outings, parties, weddings, and more. Pros: - Comfortable Fabric: Lightweight, soft, and breathable polyester material ensures comfort during hot summer days. - Stylish Design: The deep V-neck, ruffle cap sleeves, and A-line silhouette add a trendy and elegant touch. - Versatile Use: Perfect for both casual and formal occasions, offering great flexibility in styling. - Flattering Fit: High waist design and midi length create a flattering silhouette that enhances your figure. - Easy to Accessorize: Comes with an extra belt and can be paired with various accessories for different looks. Cons: - Limited Color Options: Available only in white, additional color options could enhance its appeal. - Size Availability: While available in sizes S, M, L, and XL, a wider range of sizes could cater to more body types. Conclusion: The BTFBM Women‚Äôs Summer Bohemian Floral Dress is an excellent addition to any wardrobe. Its lightweight and breathable fabric make it ideal for summer, while its stylish design and flattering fit ensure you look and feel your best. The versatility of this dress makes it suitable for a variety of occasions, from casual days out to more formal events. With its elegant design and comfortable fit, this dress is a must-have for any fashion-conscious woman. Recommendation: I highly recommend the BTFBM Women‚Äôs Bohemian Floral Wrap Dress for anyone looking to add a touch of elegance and comfort to their summer wardrobe. Its stylish design, flattering fit, and versatile nature make it perfect for a wide range of occasions. Whether you‚Äôre attending a wedding, heading to the beach, or enjoying a casual day out, this dress will ensure you look chic and feel comfortable. Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White Big Flower, Floral White Red, Swiss Dot Purple, Swiss Dot Light Green, Swiss Dot Grey Blue, Floral Orange Pink Red, Swiss Dot Black, Solid Royal Blue, Black, Coffee/White/Brown, Swiss Dot Army Green, Green Big Floral, Swiss Dot Light Blue, Solid Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
